title: React Hooks Counter Demo
description: An example of creating a counter component using React Hooks.

title: Traffic light using hooks
description: A switching traffic light that makes use of React Hooks.

title: useLocalStorage
description: Sync state to local storage so that it persists through a page refresh. Usage is similar to useState except we pass in a local storage key so that we can default to that value on page load instead of the specified initial value.

title: React Hooks Animations
description: Shows how React Hooks can be used with react-spring to create new type of animations.

title: useState() and useEffect()
description: An example of using useState() and useEffect()

title: Declarative Intervals
description: An implementation of setInterval using React Hooks, showing how you can clean up the interval correctly and even how to dynamically change the delay. https://overreacted.io/making-setinterval-declarative-with-react-hooks/

title: basic useTransition masonry grid
description: Using React Hooks in combination with react-spring to create a transition in a masonry grid.

title: useSpring React Hook
description: Shows how you can use the useSpring hook and react-spring library to create high-performance interactive animations.

title: Sequence vs Timestep Animations
description: Using react-spring in combination with hooks to do sequence and timestep animations.

title: Comment System using React Hooks
description: An example Reddit-like comment system using React Hooks.

title: Form Hooks
description: Implementation of a form where the props for the elements are provided with hooks.

title: Animated Routes
description: Animated routes using a hook called 'useRouter' and the 'useTransition' hook from react-spring.

title: Konami Code
description: A hook that listens when the Konami code is pressed

title: useWindowResize
description: Respond to a window resize event using a hook.

title: Cancelable Fetch
description: A fetch implementation that can be cancelled
